title: Looking to Buy an EV? Get on a Wait List
sub_head: Auto shoppers put down deposits for high-demand vehicles, which executives say can help gauge consumer interest
body:
Bill Plein was interested in buying one of several electric pickup trucks coming to the U.S. market. So he did what many shoppers of high-demand vehicles have done lately: He made a reservation.
Mr. Plein plunked down a refundable deposit last May for a spot on the waiting list to buy Ford Motor Co. â€™s new electric pickup truck, the F-150 Lightning, set to start distribution this spring. Late last year, he made a separate reservation to buy an electric pickup from startup Rivian Automotive Inc.
